courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Business Administration
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Program in Management, Leadership, Business Administration, Project Management for CEO / C-level
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Executive Program in Business Administration


You will know about: business administration, its functions and focuses; how to manage material flows and human resources; what is organizational structure, its types and how to synchronize different departments; what is project management and its methods; setting goals and planning in organizations; what is ethic in business; logistic and its characteristics; how to develop organization


After finishing a course you will get: basic knowledge about business administration and, mainly, how to manage company, its processes at different levels


Course Plan:

1. About the course, topic and author

2. Administrative management and the essence of Business Administration

3. Management of material and human resources

4. Organizational structure and synchronization of departments

5. Project management

6. Setting goals and planning in enterprise

7. Ethics of business

8. Business logistics

9. Organizational development management


Course Authors:

Igor Dmitriev

Education: I. MBA, The Boston University, USA, II. Master of Science at Engineering (Technical) Management, The State University of New York at Buffalo, USA, III. Six Sigma Black Belt

Expert at Banking (>16 years), FinTech & Digital (>12 years), Experienced Manager (>12 years) with successful track of records at personal and corporate entrepreneurship

More than 12 years at worldwide banking groups such us Societe Generale, Raiffeisenbank

Experience at roles: CEO, Head of Business, Chief Digital & Marketing Officer, Head of Digital Transformation and Channels, Head of Products and Marketing

coach for the development of leadership qualities.


Course Full Description and Welcome Letter: Executive Program in Business Administration

This course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads of departments, etc. The course could help to improve your managerial skills and also to create annual company plan, budgets and effectively set organizational goals.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge and instruments of administrative management or business administration. Also, here you can find interesting tools and, for example, different types of organizational structures.


All this information will help you to gain more confidence in your position as a manager or CEO.


The Executive Program in Business Administration is a comprehensive and intensive course designed to equip professionals with the essential knowledge and skills required for effective administrative management in a business environment. This program covers a wide range of topics that are crucial for individuals aspiring to build successful careers or establish their own businesses.


Administrative Management: This topic explores the fundamental principles and practices of administrative management, including decision-making, problem-solving, and effective communication within an organization. Participants learn how to streamline processes, improve productivity, and foster a positive work culture.


The Essence of Business Administration: This module delves into the core concepts and theories that underpin business administration. It focuses on the key functions of management, such as planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and how they contribute to the overall success of an organization.


Management of Material and Human Resources: This topic addresses the crucial aspects of managing both material resources (e.g., inventory, supplies) and human resources (e.g., recruitment, training, performance evaluation). Participants gain insights into effective resource allocation, talent management, and enhancing employee productivity.


Organizational Structure and Synchronization of Departments: This module examines the design and implementation of organizational structures and explores strategies for coordinating and synchronizing different departments within an organization. Participants learn how to optimize communication and collaboration across teams to achieve organizational goals.


Project Management: This topic introduces participants to the principles and practices of project management, emphasizing the planning, execution, and control of projects. It covers the advantages and disadvantages of project management, various project management methodologies, and techniques for managing risks and stakeholders.


Goal Setting and Planning in Organization: This module focuses on the importance of setting clear goals and developing effective plans to achieve them. Participants learn how to create actionable plans, align goals with organizational objectives, and monitor progress towards achieving desired outcomes.


Ethics of Business: This topic explores the ethical dimensions of business administration and highlights the significance of ethical decision-making and responsible business practices. Participants gain an understanding of ethical frameworks and learn how to navigate complex ethical dilemmas in the business world.


Business Logistics: This module addresses the management of the flow of goods and services within a business. It covers topics such as supply chain management, inventory control, transportation, and distribution. Participants learn how to optimize logistics processes to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.


Organizational Development Management: This topic focuses on strategies and techniques for managing organizational change and development. Participants gain insights into the importance of adapting to evolving market dynamics, fostering innovation, and building a resilient and agile organization.


Importance of Business Administration for Building a Career and Own Business:


Understanding the principles and practices of business administration is vital for individuals seeking to build successful careers or establish their own businesses. Here's why:


Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.


Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.


Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.


Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.


Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.


Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.


Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.


Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.


In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.


Linked topics:

  • MBA

  • Business Fundamentals

  • Business Strategy

  • Management

  • Business Management

  • Leadership

  • Business Administration

  • MBA Master Degree preparation

  • CEO

  • Chief Executive Officer

courseDetails.title: Diploma in Music Therapy - in an hour (+14 hours study!)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma in Music Therapy: Using Sound to Heal
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is ONLY an hour long but there is a heavy emphasis on participation, student input, sharing of ideas and experiences so the course may actually be a whole lot longer!

The course begins with a brief introduction to music therapy and its benefits, followed by an overview of the theoretical frameworks that underpin music therapy. This includes an explanation of how music can be used to address physical, emotional, cognitive, and social needs. In particular there is an emphasis on the practical experience of one of the Instructors - an accomplished musician with qualifications in NLP and Music Therapy as well.

The majority of the course is devoted to demonstrating different techniques and approaches used in music therapy, such as improvisation, songwriting, and receptive listening. Each technique is explained in detail, along with examples of how they have been used successfully in real-life situations. The course also includes case studies of successful music therapy interventions and a discussion of the challenges and limitations of this form of therapy. This not a course that just sings tyhe praises of this form of therapy - there is a lecture on the downsides too.

The course concludes with a recap of the key points covered and an encouragement to seek further training or information if participants are interested in pursuing music therapy as a career or for personal use.

Overall, the goal of the course is to provide a basic understanding of music therapy and its potential benefits, while also highlighting some of the techniques and approaches used in this form of therapy.

Make sure you read the regular Educational Announcements and engage in discussions in the Q/A !
targetAudiences: Everyone interested in broadening their understanding of therapeutic techniques
Budding songwriters!
Everyone thinking of studying music therapy
Anyone stressed

courseDetails.title: Construye Dashboards increíbles con Power BI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Construye Dashboards increíbles con Power BI
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bienvenido al curso completo de Power BI. Este es un curso exhaustivo que te enseñará todo lo que necesitas saber para convertirte en un experto en esta herramienta de análisis de datos.


Power BI es una herramienta de análisis de datos poderosa y fácil de usar que te permite conectarte a diversas fuentes de datos, transformarlos y crear visualizaciones interactivas y atractivas para su presentación. Este curso cubre todos los aspectos de Power BI, desde la introducción a los conceptos básicos hasta la creación de informes avanzados y sofisticados.


En este curso de Power BI, aprenderás a conectarte a diferentes fuentes de datos, como bases de datos, archivos de Excel, archivos CSV y archivos de texto. También aprenderás a crear transformaciones y modelado de datos utilizando el Editor de consultas, que te permite unir, combinar y transformar los datos de manera eficiente.


Aprenderás a crear informes y visualizaciones efectivas utilizando una variedad de gráficos y tablas dinámicas. También te enseñaremos a trabajar con fórmulas DAX para crear cálculos complejos y avanzados, como medias móviles, análisis de tendencias y clasificaciones.


Este curso de Power BI también cubre el desarrollo de dashboards y la publicación de informes en la nube y en servidores locales. Te enseñaremos cómo compartir informes y dashboards con otros usuarios y cómo integrarlos en tus propias aplicaciones.


Este curso de Power BI está diseñado para ser práctico y orientado a proyectos. Aprenderás a través de una serie de ejercicios y proyectos, que te ayudarán a aplicar tus conocimientos en situaciones reales. También tendrás la oportunidad de trabajar en un proyecto final, que te permitirá crear un informe completo de Power BI desde cero.


En resumen, este curso completo de Power BI es la manera perfecta de aprender cómo utilizar esta herramienta para el análisis de datos y la creación de informes interactivos. Si estás interesado en convertirte en un experto en Power BI, ¡este es el curso para ti!
targetAudiences: Personas que necesiten aprender Power BI para uso personal, en el trabajo o para su negocio.
Quien quiera conocer nuevas herramientas para preparar reportes y analizar la información
Quieres destacar en tu trabajo o buscar nuevas oportunidades. Power BI es el software de BI más utilizado.
Usuarios que quieran mejorar sus habilidades de análisis

courseDetails.title: How To Write Your Business Plan (in One Day} With ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock the Power of AI & Create Comprehensive Business Plans Quickly & Efficiently. Perfect for Entrepreneurs & Startups
courseDetails.longDescription:
Business Planning Simplified: Write Your Plan with ChatGPT" is a groundbreaking course designed specifically for today's entrepreneurs, startups, and small-to-medium business owners. If you've ever felt overwhelmed by the prospect of creating a detailed business plan, you're not alone. Traditional business planning can be cumbersome, time-consuming, and frankly, intimidating. This course aims to change that narrative by simplifying the complex process into actionable steps, using the intelligence of ChatGPT, a cutting-edge AI language model developed by OpenAI.

ChatGPT has the uncanny ability to understand, generate, and manipulate human language. By leveraging its capabilities, we walk you through each segment of a standard business plan—Executive Summary, Market Research, Operational Plan, Financial Projections, and much more. The AI assists you in articulating your business vision crisply, conducting comprehensive market research, developing a foolproof operational strategy, and even helps with complex tasks like financial modeling. All this with real-time, AI-driven insights that can adapt to the nuances of your specific business type and market.

Imagine not having to spend days or weeks trying to find the perfect words to convey your vision, or nights crunching numbers to make sure your financials make sense. This course will teach you how to cohesively incorporate AI technology into your planning process, making it not just faster but substantially more reliable.

The utility of a robust business plan can never be understated. Whether you are trying to attract investors, secure a loan, or simply provide a growth map for your team to follow, a business plan is indispensable. However, the real power of this course lies in its ability to make business planning more accessible and less daunting for everyone. It essentially democratizes business planning, offering equal opportunity for success, irrespective of your business acumen or prior experience.

The course doesn't stop at just helping you create a business plan. It arms you with the skill to adapt, change, and grow your plan as your business evolves. Business isn't static; it's dynamic and ever-changing. The planning tools you'll gain from this course will serve you throughout your entrepreneurial journey, giving you the confidence to tackle future challenges head-on.

Don't let the hurdles of traditional business planning deter you from achieving your business dreams. Let's rewrite the rules. "Business Planning Simplified: Write Your Plan with ChatGPT" is not just a course; it's a revolution in how business planning is done. Enroll now to be a part of this game-changing approach and take the first confident steps towards business success!

Small Business Owners
Business Consultants and Advisors
Students and Academics

courseDetails.title: Beyond Basics: Calculating Cone Surface  Area with Precision

courseDetails.longDescription:

4. What is the meaning of an oblique cone?

7. What is the meaning of height of a right circular cone?

8. List the formula which shows the relationship between height, radius, and slant height in a right circular cone.

9. What is meant by curved surface area of a cone?

12. What is meant by total surface area of a cone?

courseDetails.title: IFIC Investment Funds in Canada Exam Preparation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pass the IFIC or IFC exam in the smart way!
courseDetails.longDescription:
What is the IFIC Certification?


The IFIC course is a requirement to work in the banking sector in Canada. Once you pass the exam, you are eligible to be registered as a Mutual Fund Representative in a bank. You can advise clients on how to invest their money by recommending suitable mutual funds. Some banks hire candidates without the IFIC and you must pass it within 3-6 months. Others hire only qualified employees.


Can I work from home after passing the IFIC exam and getting hired?


Yes, some companies are providing online client appointments for investment advice. So it is possible to work from home.


Can I work in the back office after completing the IFIC?


If you don't like sales or want to work in mutual fund and investment processing back-office, it is possible, the pay rate is 17-23 dollars/hr


What's the pay rate for client-facing jobs with an IFIC certification?


In Canada, for a financial advisor, it could be around 25 to 30 dollars/hr. So on the low end, it could be 50K annually before taxes and deductions. On the high end, you may reach 100K before taxes with bonuses and performance incentives.


How do I enroll in the exam from a provider?


Visit the Canadian Securities Institute or IFSE websites for details. Both IFIC and IFC are equivalent in the banks.


Why should I enroll in your exam preparation course?


The topics in each chapter are explained in an easy-to-understand manner. You will save time and effort by reviewing the videos. You can study at your own pace. The price for the videos is much cheaper than hiring a tutor or attending a seminar.


What is covered in the IFIC Exam preparation course?


These exam preparation videos cover the topics in both the CSI, IFIC/IFC, and IFSE courses

The following topics and chapters are covered in this course:


1. The role of the mutual fund sales representatives.


2. The overview of the Canadian Financial Marketplace.


3. Economic principles.


4. Getting to know the client; how to recommend suitable investments.


5. Behavioral finance - how clients decide what to invest in


6. Tax and retirement planning


7. Types of Investment Products and How They Are Traded


8. Constructing Investment Portfolios


9. Understanding Financial Statements


10. The Modern Mutual Fund


11. Conservative Mutual Fund Products


12. Riskier Mutual Fund Products


13. Alternative Manages Products


14. Understanding Mutual Fund Performance


15. Selecting a Mutual Fund


16. Mutual Fund Fees and Services


17. Mutual Fund Dealer Regulation


18. Applying Ethical Standards to What You Have Learned

The videos are narrated with PDF summary slides that describe the topics in an easy-to-understand manner. The reference book is 444 pages and has a lot of detail. This summary of the course focuses on the main aspects that are expected in the exam, as well as the knowledge that is required to provide clients with a high level of knowledge and experience.

Die ausgezeichneten Erkenntnisse des österreichischen Komponisten und Musiktheoretikers Johann Fux bilden die Grundlage dieser Methode, "Kontrapunktlehre" , wie sie in diesem Kurs vorgestellt wird.

You don't have to play an instrument to train your ear.

This course is a comprehensive Recoil tutorial that will teach you everything you need to know to start using Recoil in your React applications. We will build an app from scratch as a code-along, and you will learn how to use Recoil to manage state in a scalable and efficient way. In this comprehensive and in-depth course, you will embark on an immersive journey through the Recoil official documentation, simplifying key concepts for practical solutions, and equipping yourself with the knowledge and expertise to excel as a React developer.

Why am I the right  teacher for you?

My name is Clarian, I've worked as a head engineer with top tech and entertainment companies around the world for over 15 years, tech developer, Co-founder for million plus businesses built from scratch, consultant in the space for billion plus tech companies, and I am fully passionate and dedicated to what I teach. My courses and programming is published world wide including on highly regarded computer science publications such as Safari O'Reilly. I've been working very hard to make the switch into being a full time online programming instructor.

From Junior to Senior: Progressively Advanced Topics

Starting from the junior level, we will guide you through a carefully designed learning path, ensuring that you build a strong foundation. We will cover the fundamentals of React and Recoil, gradually progressing to highly advanced topics that will prepare you to tackle complex real-world projects.

A Deep Dive into the Recoil Official Docs and Beyond

No stone will be left unturned as we dive deep into the Recoil official documentation. We will meticulously explore each concept and technique, giving you a comprehensive understanding of Recoil principles, best practices, and advanced features.

Course Content

In this course, you will learn:

  • What Recoil is and why it is so popular

  • How to install and configure Recoil in your React applications

  • How to create and use Recoil atoms

  • How to create and use Recoil selectors

  • How to persist Recoil state to local storage

  • How to use advanced Recoil features to build scalable state management logic

Who Should Take This Course

This course is ideal for React developers who want to learn how to use Recoil to manage state in their applications. It is also a good choice for developers who are looking for a more efficient and scalable alternative to Redux.

Why Learn Recoil

Here are some of the reasons why you should learn Recoil:

  • Recoil is easy to learn and use. It has a simple API that is similar to React's.

  • Recoil is powerful and flexible. It can be used to manage state in any type of React application, from simple to complex.

  • Recoil is fast and efficient. It is designed to scale to even the most demanding applications.

  • Recoil is popular and well-supported. It is used by many large companies, and it has a large and active community.

Recoil vs Redux

Recoil is a newer state management library than Redux, but it has quickly become popular due to its simplicity, power, and performance.

Here are some of the advantages of Recoil over Redux:

  • Recoil is easier to learn and use. It has a simpler API and fewer concepts to learn.

  • Recoil is more flexible. It can be used to manage state in any type of React application, from simple to complex.

  • Recoil is faster and more efficient. It is designed to scale to even the most demanding applications.

  • Recoil is  popular and well-supported. It is used by many large companies, and it has a large and active community.

Course Topics

  • Introduction to Recoil

    • What is Recoil?

    • Why is Recoil so popular?

    • Recoil vs Redux

  • Getting Started with Recoil

    • Installing and configuring Recoil

    • Creating and using Recoil atoms

  • Recoil Selectors

    • What are Recoil selectors?

    • Creating and using Recoil selectors

  • Persisting Recoil State

    • Persisting Recoil state to local storage

  • Advanced Recoil Features

    • Managing state in complex applications

    • Using Recoil with multiple components

  • Building a Recoil App

    • Code-along: building a simple Recoil app

Conclusion

By the end of this course, you will have a deep understanding of Recoil and how to use it to build scalable and high-performance React applications.

Topics Include:

  • Recoil

  • React

  • State management

  • JavaScript

  • Web development

  • Mobile development

  • Scalable applications

  • High-performance applications

Call to Action

Enroll in this course today and learn how to use Recoil to build scalable and high-performance React applications!

courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is a complete coverage of the CSC Canadian Securities Course (CSI), Part 1. The topics for each chapter are explained using PowerPoint summary slides and industry examples are provided.

This course covers all the chapters as under:

PART 1:

1. The Capital Market

2. The Canadian Securities Industry

3. The Canadian Regulatory Environment

4. Economic Principles

5. Economic Policy

6. Fixed Income Securities: Features and Types

7. Fixed Income Securities: Pricing and Trading

8. Equity Securities: Common and Preferred Shares

9. Equity Securities: Equity Transactions

10. Derivatives

11. Corporations and Their Financial Statements

12. Financing and Listing Securities


What is the CSC Certification?


The CSC course is a requirement to work in the banking sector in Canada. Once you pass the exam, you are eligible to be registered as a Mutual Fund Representative in a bank. This course has two parts. You must pass Part 1 and Part 2.  Then you can get registered with MFDA or IIROC as a mutual fund representative.

If you pass the CPH (Conduct Practices Handbook), then you can advise clients on how to invest their money by recommending suitable stocks, bond, mutual funds and many other investments.  Some banks hire candidates without the CSC and you must pass it within 3-6 months. Others hire only qualified employees.

If you plan on only working in the retail bank in Canada, the IFIC exam is sufficient, you don't need to do the CSC. But if you want more job opportunities in the future, the CSC is best.


Can I work from home after passing the IFIC exam and getting hired?


Yes, some companies are providing online client appointments for investment advice. So it is possible to work from home.


Can I work in the back office after completing the IFIC?


If you don't like sales or want to work in mutual funds, stocks and investment processing back-office, it is possible, the pay rate is 17-25 dollars/hr. You will assist a licensed financial advisor and manage the administration of the office.


What's the pay rate for client-facing jobs with a CSC certification?


In Canada, for a financial advisor, it could be around 25 to 30 dollars/hr. So on the low end, it could be 50K annually before taxes and deductions. On the high end, you may reach 100K with bonuses and performance incentives.


How do I enroll in the exam from a provider?


Visit the Canadian Securities Institute or IFSE websites for details. Both IFIC and IFC are equivalent in the banks. CSC is also equivalent in the banks, but it may lead to many other jobs in the bank & head office.


Why should I enroll in your exam preparation course?


The topics in each chapter are explained in an easy-to-understand manner. You will save time and effort by reviewing the videos. You can study at your own pace. The price for the videos is much cheaper than hiring a tutor or attending a seminar.


What is covered in the CSC Exam preparation course?

See the detail above.

See our course on CSC part 2 on Udemy also!

We also have training courses on LLQP, Microsoft, and Google products.

Você aprenderá estratégias práticas para identificar gatilhos emocionais, reconhecer os sinais de acúmulo de tensão e, o mais importante, empregar técnicas eficazes de gestão de conflitos para transformar a raiva em uma força construtiva.

Imagine poder aplicar essas habilidades não apenas no ambiente profissional, mas também em sua vida pessoal, cultivando relacionamentos mais saudáveis e harmoniosos.

A gestão de conflitos não se trata apenas de resolver desentendimentos, mas sim de criar um terreno fértil para o crescimento pessoal e interpessoal.

Este curso inovador oferece uma abordagem holística para a gestão de conflitos, abordando os aspectos emocionais, psicológicos e práticos dessa habilidade.

Você será capacitado a reconhecer quando a raiva está prestes a se transformar em um conflito prejudicial e a aplicar ferramentas específicas para redirecionar essa energia de maneira positiva.

Através da prática contínua, você poderá internalizar esses princípios e se tornar um mestre na arte da gestão de conflitos.

Não deixe que a raiva prejudique suas relações e oportunidades de crescimento.

Este curso é a chave para desbloquear seu potencial máximo na área da gestão de conflitos e garantir que sua raiva seja uma força de motivação e transformação.

Nesse curso você aprenderá a:


Seção 1: Os benefícios da gestão da raiva e dos conflitos segundo a neurociência.


  • Teste como saber o seu nível de reação à agressão dos outros

  • Teste você está nos 4 níveis avançados de reação à agressão?

  • O que faz um ser-humano sentir raiva?  Qual a causa desse sentimento?

  • A raiva pode ser um sentimento relativamente bom

  • Use a sua raiva para o crescimento e autoconhecimento


Seção 2:  Técnicas poderosas para se livrar da raiva e superar conflitos


  • Só 6 segundos para sair da raiva e atingir a paz, neurociência para ser feliz

  • Educação emocional para você não brigar e ser feliz, gestão de conflitos

  • Aula prática: aplicando a comunicação não-violenta na gestão da raiva.

  • Hipnoterapia para encontrar a sua luz interior

  • Como lidar com alguém que lhe agride, comunicação não-violenta turbinada

  • Os 3 erros que dificultam a gestão da raiva e a resolução de conflitos

  • Aula sobre inteligência emocional: a técnica do Hulk para o controle da raiva


Seção 3: O incrível poder da inteligência emocional


  • Porque é importante você elevar a sua inteligência emocional?

  • Hipnoterapia: use suas emoções para atrair o que você quiser

  • As 4 fases da comunicação não-violenta

  • Hipnose para lidar com insultos e com a raiva


E muito mais coisa nas 50 aulas do curso.


Não espere mais para investir em si mesmo e em suas relações. Matricule-se agora no curso Gestão de Conflitos: Como Lidar com a Sua Raiva e trilhe o caminho para uma vida mais equilibrada e bem-sucedida.
targetAudiences: Pessoas que "explodem" com facilidade
Pessoas que sentem raiva frequentemente e desejam encontrar a paz e a tranquilidade dentro de si.
Pessoas que estudam ou praticam psicologia positiva
Quem quer ter um maior nível de autoconhecimento

courseDetails.title: Gehörbildung leicht gemacht - Ear Training
courseDetails.shortDescription: Wie du dein musikalisches Gehör schnell und effektiv weiterbilden kannst
courseDetails.longDescription:
Entdecke die Welt der Töne!


Willst du die Sprache der Musik erlernen?

Gehörbildung ist die Grundlage der musikalischen Sprache.

Daher solltest du als erstes dein Gehör ausbilden, wenn du die musikalische Sprache sprechen willst.

Das bekommst du:


  • Eine praktische Methode zeigt wie du dein Gehör effektiv und schnell bilden kannst.

  • Du bekommst eine Schritt-für-Schritt- Anleitung, die du sofort umsetzen kannst.

  • Du wirst in kurzer Zeit, anhand der Anleitung notierte Melodien vorsingen können.


Kurs-Beschreibung


Mit welcher Methode kannst Du dein Gehör am besten bilden?

Du musst kein Instrument spielen, damit Du Dein Gehör trainieren kannst.

Es gibt einige Gehörbildungskurse, Videos und Softwares.

Bei denen muss man nur zuhören.

Am besten und gründlichsten lernst Du aber, wenn du mitsingst.

So bist du am Lernprozess aktiv beteiligt und lernst am effektivsten und schnellsten.


Weil du dein Gehör auf Klangmuster programmierst und diese abrufst in dem du singst.

Wenn du schon ein Instrument spielst, kannst du  einfach jetzt anfangen nebenbei dein Gehör zu bilden!


Probiere diese Methode aus, du wirst merken wie gut dein Gehör sich entwickeln wird.

Du wirst so die Musik mit anderen „Ohren“ wahrnehmen.

Ich zeige dir viele Grafiken, die deinem Gehör helfen werden.

Du wirst noch nebenbei also neben Gehörbildung das Notensystem und das Noten lesen von Grund auf kennen und verstehen lernen.

Für ein besseres Verständnis sorgt am Ende eines jeden Kapitels eine notierte Melodie, die du dann vorsingst. 

So kannst Du das erlernte Wissen gleich anwenden!

Das ist ein Zielorientierter Lehrgang, der dein musikalisches Gehör auf eine natürlichen Weise bildet


Das wirst du lernen:

  • Du wirst das musikalische ABC, die Tonstufen nach Gehör erkennen, benennen und singen können.

  • Du wirst in kurzer Zeit, anhand der Anleitung die notierte Melodien vorsingen können.

  • Du wirst die Intervalle nach Gehör erkennen können und sie in ein System einordnen.


Der Kurs ist ein methodisch aufbauender Weg zur Entwicklung des musikalischen Gehörs.


Anforderungen:

  • Voraussetzung ist ein Smartphone/Tablet

  • Ein einfaches Lied wie z.B Happy Birthday singen oder summen können.

Entdecke die Welt der Töne hörend!


Starte jetzt mit dem Kurs!
targetAudiences: Menschen die ihr musikalisches Gehör bilden wollen.
Menschen die die Sprache der Musik erlernen möchten.
Menschen die das Notenlesen und singen vom Blatt entdecken wollen.

courseDetails.title: Como atrair alguém muito especial para o namoro ou casamento
courseDetails.shortDescription: Técnicas avançadas de reprogramação do mindset e hipnoterapia para você ser feliz no namoro ou casamento
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mindset para ter um parceiro ideal no namoro e no casamento


  • Você sente carência afetiva?


  • Já se decepcionou com relacionamentos anteriores?


  • Você está prestes a perder a esperança de encontrar seu parceiro de vida?


  • Quer entender melhor seus próprios sentimentos em relação a outra pessoa?


  • Você está frustrado com o processo de namoro, mas não quer se contentar com a pessoa errada?


  • Gostaria de ser feliz no namoro e no casamento?

Se você deseja encontrar e manter rapidamente seu parceiro de vida ideal e namorar com mais eficiência e eficácia, então este é o curso para você.


Veja o que dizem sobre o curso:


"Tem dicas valiosas. O autor demonstra conhecimentos profundos do tema tratado, entregando mais conteúdos ficará top" - Gilvanete Dantas de Oliveira Pereira


"Ola Professor! Muito bom seu curso gostei dos conhecimentos que estou aprendendo com Você." -  Leonardo Ernesto


O que você vai encontrar nesse curso?


Nele você vai saber como atrair alguém muito especial para namoro ou casamento

Saber como atrair o seu amado é fundamental para o sucesso do namoro ou da união de casas, nada deixa os homens tão felizes quanto uma mulher que sabe como ser irresistível.

Não perca tempo, confira agora mesmo os detalhes para saber como atrair alguém muito especial para namoro ou casamento

O curso mindset para ter um parceiro ideal no namoro e no casamento, enfoca as habilidades refinadas necessárias para encontrar, atrair e manter seu parceiro de vida ideal.


Nele eu irei te ajudar a:


  1. Se tornar mais atraente aos olhos dos outros e de si mesmo(a)

    (seção 3 - como usar a sua energia sexual para se tornar mais atraente)


  2. Quer conquistar seu amado? Dê uma olhada nos fatores que levam a isso. Reprograme a sua mente para atrair um grande amor

    (seção 2 - aula "meditação guiada para encontrar um grande  amor)


  3. Descubra os segredos dos relacionamentos: desde o primeiro olhar até o final feliz!

    ( seção 5 - os ingredientes de um relacionamento feliz)


  4. Neste treinamento de mindset para o namoro e casamento você aprenderá todas as informações necessárias para construir qualquer relacionamento feliz

    (seção 4 - como encontrar um parceiro ideal)


  5. Este treinamento permitirá que você avalie e conserte seu relacionamento,  permitindo que seu próprio relacionamento atual ou futuro prospere continuamente.

    (seção 5 - aula "a chave para um casamento feliz)


Se você simplesmente deseja ter um relacionamento de grande sucesso,


então este curso é para você.


Vamos guiá-lo através de uma abordagem passo a passo para aprender:


  • O fundo físico e psicológico da atração


  • Como se beneficiar de seus atributos semelhantes e opostos


  • Os erros  que sabotam os seus relacionamentos


Brindes -   baixe gratuitamente na aula "introdução de como encontrar um parceiro ideal" os downloads e ebooks abaixo:

Materiais para download

SUPERANDO A CARÊNCIA AFETIVA.pdf (7 páginas)

OS TRÊS NÍVEIS DE PERCEPÇÃO (2)(1).pdf (9 páginas)

APRENDENDO+A+REPROGRAMAR+O+SEU+SUBCONSCIENTE.pdf (1.5 MB)

A FONTE.pdf (671.8 kB)

Sexo,prazer_v2.pdf (1.2 MB)

Fernando Neves_Conquistando la felicidad_ficha catalografica (2).pdf (3.7 MB)



O que me habilita a lhe ensinar esse curso?


Sou terapeuta transpessoal, EMDR, thetahealing e facilitador de pathwork e aprendi, ao longo de 25 anos várias técnicas avançadas de relacionamentos e autoconhecimento.


Atualmente faço atendimentos online e em grupo para pacientes de Portugal,  Estados Unidos, Cabo Verde, França, Chile, Luxemburgo e várias partes do Brasil.


O mais importante: eu descobrir as armadilhas do que estava fazendo de errado no campo afetivo e sou casado e feliz há anos.


Graças a essas técnicas eu não só melhorei, mas também tenho ajudado a transformar a vida dos meus pacientes e de quase 12000 alunos que eu tenho em mais de 78 países.


Particularmente estou sou viúvo de um casamento onde fui muito feliz por 7 anos e, atualmente, estou num casamento maravilhoso com uma mulher maravilhosa.


Contudo, antes disso, durante várias décadas, amarguei solidão e relacionamentos frustrantes, descobrindo que a causa dos infortúnios não estava na outra pessoa, mas em mim mesmo.


Através de todas essas terapias que menciono acima, dei a volta por cima e desejo, sinceramente, compartilhar essas técnicas com você.


O que esse curso tem de especial?


  1. Em outras palavras: isso você não vai aprender em nenhuma escola ou faculdade, mas apenas nesse curso.


  2. Ajudará a você ampliar a sua inteligência emocional, possibilitando um relacionamento mais feliz e duradouro


  3. Você não só aprenderá como conviver bem com o outro, mas também a ficar bem sozinho(a) e ser feliz acompanhado(a) ou consigo mesmo(a)


Desejo-lhe uma boa jornada rumo a um casamento feliz. Um grande abraço e fica com Deus!
targetAudiences: Quem que quer ser feliz no amor

Oi, tudo bem? Meu nome é Fernando Neves, sou terapeuta transpessoal e hipnólogo e gostaria de lhe convidar para uma jornada de crescimento e auto-conhecimento.

Permita-me lhe fazer algumas perguntas importantes:

  • Você tem passado por problemas conjugais?


  • Já se deparou com a infidelidade do seu parceiro?


  • Já passou por situações constrangedoras de violência doméstica?


  • Tem enfrentado dificuldades financeiras?


  • Sente-se sozinha e carente?


  • Passa por situações de tristeza e desesperança?

Se você disse "sim" para pelo menos uma dessas questões esse curso é para você.


Porque você tem que fazer esse curso?

  1. Porque estamos diante de uma pandemia de depressão e a maioria das pessoas não sabem o que fazer a respeito


  2. Porque a ansiedade é uma doença que assola a maioria da humanidade


  3. Porque boa parte da população vivem tomando remédios controlados ( às vezes por conta própria) para lidar com essas doenças


  4. Porque através desse curso você descobrirá como lidar com a depressão e a ansiedade de uma forma leve e fácil


  5. Porque a causa da depressão e da ansiedade está no seu subconsciente e você irá aprender como reprogramá-lo


Nesse curso eu lhe ensinarei todos as  técnicas de inteligência emocional que lhe ajudarão a mudar o seu mindset emocional dentro de poucos minutos e também reencontrar a sua alegria e força interior.

São aulas rápidas, mas extremamente eficazes e poderosas.

Também darei o passo a passo de como eu mesmo saí de um estado de depressão e apatia para a felicidade que sinto hoje.

Como hipnólogo e terapeuta divido diariamente com os meus pacientes o que você assistirá nesse curso e, para mim, o maior pagamento que recebo é vê-los com as suas vidas totalmente transformadas - o que me deixa ainda mais feliz e realizado!

Meu objetivo agora é compartilhar todo esse tesouro de conhecimento científico e experiência de vida com você!

O que você aprenderá nesse curso:

  1. Tornar-se uma pessoa melhor e muito mais feliz


  2. Transformar problemas em oportunidades


  3. Desenvolver sentimentos nobres e enriquecedores


  4. Ter mais qualidade de vida e melhores relacionamentos


  5. Desenvolver um estado de paz inabalável


  6. Tornar-se próspero espiritual e materialmente


  7. Realizar os seus sonhos e objetivos mais ousados


  8. Ter uma vida sexual prazerosa, feliz e sem culpas


  9. Usar sua energia sexual como combustível para o seu sucesso

Você também quer saber o segredo para:

  • Ter mais qualidade de vida


  • Relacionar-se melhor com as pessoas que ama


  • Alcançar seus objetivos de forma simples e rápida? 


Bônus desse curso:

  • Bônus1 - Aula prática sobre como superar a depressão


  • Bônus 2 - Aula prática e teórica sobre as 5 fases da ansiedade e como superá-la


  • Bônus 3 - Downloads gratuitos para todas as aulas para você assistir em qualquer lugar mesmo sem Internet


  • Bônus 4 - 30 dias de garantia com devolução do seu dinheiro caso você não goste do curso



O que me habilita a lhe ensinar esse curso?

1. Como hipnólogo e terapeuta transpessoal divido diariamente com os meus pacientes o que você assistirá nesse curso e, para mim, o maior pagamento que recebo é vê-los com as suas vidas totalmente transformadas - o que me deixa ainda mais feliz e realizado!

2. O mais importante: tudo o que falo nesse curso, apliquei em mim mesmo com resultados extraordinários em minha vida pessoal, como prosperidade, abundância, plenitude, paz e um casamento com uma mulher maravilhosa. Tudo isso desejo compartilhar com você (menos a mulher maravilhosa,  é claro - rsrs).

3. Tenho mais de 12000 alunos em 78 países que também têm se impactado com esse trabalho. 


Você tem duas escolhas:

1. Se inscrever agora nesse curso e usufruir em alguns minutos o que demorei anos para aprender

2. Seguir a vida tentando, sofrendo, errando e aprendendo, durante anos ou talvez décadas.

Eu, para lhe ser sincero, se tivesse acesso há 20 anos, a todo esse conhecimento, teria evitado muito dor, sofrimento e escolhas erradas na minha vida.

Então eu lhe convido a embarcar nessa jornada. Não perca tempo, clique agora e se inscreva.

Estarei ao seu lado para quaisquer dúvidas ou dificuldades.

Um grande abraço e fica com Deus!

courseDetails.title: Arduino para principiantes (Tinkercad-No requieres material)
courseDetails.shortDescription: No requieres comprar material
courseDetails.longDescription:
El curso que presentamos ha sido concebido con un propósito claro: brindar a todos los apasionados de la electrónica y la programación una oportunidad única para adentrarse en el fascinante mundo de Arduino, sin necesidad de disponer de un Arduino físico o materiales costosos. Nuestra meta es hacer que la tecnología sea accesible y asequible para todos.

Arduino, la plataforma de código abierto ampliamente utilizada en proyectos de electrónica, robótica e IoT, puede parecer inalcanzable para quienes carecen de los recursos necesarios para adquirir uno. Sin embargo, con este curso, la barrera de entrada se desvanece. Aquí, encontrarás una experiencia de aprendizaje enriquecedora que te permitirá explorar Arduino virtualmente.

A través de simulaciones y ejercicios interactivos, aprenderás a programar Arduino, cargar y ejecutar código, interactuar con sensores y actuadores, y crear proyectos emocionantes. No importa si eres un principiante o un entusiasta experimentado; este curso te llevará de la mano desde los conceptos básicos hasta proyectos avanzados.

Nuestra misión es empoderarte para que conviertas tus ideas en realidades tecnológicas, sin importar tu situación económica o la falta de recursos físicos. Únete a nosotros en este emocionante viaje de descubrimiento y aprendizaje, y prepárate para desbloquear todo el potencial creativo que Arduino tiene para ofrecer.

courseDetails.title: Unlock the Power of PowerPoint 365
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn How to Use New Features like Morph Transition and Cameo for Engaging Presentation
courseDetails.longDescription:
PowerPoint 365 introduces an exciting addition that elevates your presentations to new heights: Morph Transition. This groundbreaking feature empowers you to effortlessly create seamless and fluid animations between slides. With Morph, an array of objects, including text, shapes, pictures, SmartArt graphics, and WordArt, can be animated with ease. However, it's important to note that charts cannot undergo morphing.

To utilize Morph effectively, ensure you have a minimum of two slides featuring a shared object. You can either duplicate the first slide and relocate the object on the second slide or copy and paste the object from the initial slide to the second one. Once this is accomplished, apply the Morph transition to the second slide, and marvel as your object automatically animates and moves. This transition can revolutionize your presentation techniques, facilitating seamless shifts between slides.

In our course, we will demonstrate diverse ways to employ Morph, including its application to shapes, pictures, timelines, text, as a scanner, and as a magnifying lens. These techniques will empower you to bring your presentations to a whole new level, captivating and impressing your audience.

Furthermore, we will introduce you to other novel features available in PowerPoint 365, such as Cameo. By integrating this feature, you can incorporate a live feed from your computer's camera directly into your presentations, adding an extra layer of engagement and interactivity. We will also cover additional features like Icons, design tips, recording, persons, and much more.

To stay at the forefront and gain early access to new Microsoft features, subscribe to the Office Insider program. By joining this program, you will be granted exclusive access to upcoming features before they are made available to the general public.

In conclusion, Morph Transition in PowerPoint 365 serves as a potent tool that enhances the engagement and impact of your presentations. Whether you're crafting a presentation for professional or educational purposes, mastering Morph will enable you to elevate your slides to unprecedented levels of quality and captivation.
targetAudiences: Graphic Designers , and PowerPoint users

During this course, we will develop an Flutter application that will display photos taken by the rovers on Mars using Android Studio.


This app will use all the latest Flutter technologies and Framework:

  • Provider (to mange data)

  • http (REST client)

  • Future (To create asynchronous tasks)


With this example, you should be able to create an Android and iOS App to the industry standard.


We will use an architecture to separate the ui layer from the data layers. This will make the code easy to read and easy to maintain.


Your productivity will be improve as Flutter is easier to write and reuse.


You will improve your knowledge of Dart. If you use other language like Java, Kotlin or Swift this is a opportunity to learn.


Flutter is used to create mobile application for both Android and iOS. Therefore your productivity will be increased as you can have a single code base for both platforms.


In this mobile app we will use components from Materal:

  • Card

  • ListView

  • Column

  • Text

  • Image

  • SizedBox

  • Scaffold

  • Padding

Don't miss this opportunity to build your mobile developer career buy taking this course "Google Flutter Dart: build app for Android and iOS".

You will also learn how to use Google's powerful tools such as the calculator, currency converter, and unit converter to make your life easier.

courseDetails.title: مبادره ماسترز المجانية فى محاسبه المطاعم
courseDetails.shortDescription: تعرف على محاسبة المطعم وإعداد التقارير ، وحدد التكاليف ذات الصلة المستخدمة في مسك دفاتر المطاعم ، واكتشف كيفية حسابها
courseDetails.longDescription:
لأعمال المطاعم والمطاعم القائمة والشركات الناشئة. ستحسن هذه الدورة بشكل كبير من فرصتك في النجاح

الدليل المهنى فى محاسبه تكاليف المطاعم ، هو إحدى مكونات منظومه إدارك المجانيه المقدمه من أكاديميه ماسترز للنظم الأداريه و المحاسبيه

يقدم إليك هذا الدليل المصور،رؤيه متكامله على الخبرات الأزمه للمدراء الماليين ورؤساء الحسابات عن طبيعه مهامهم فى نشاط محاسبه المطاعم

هذا الدليل يمكنك من فهم مكونات النظام المحاسبي فى المطعم وعناصر المجموعات الدفتريه و الدوره المستنديه الكامله لحسابات المطاعم.

هذا الدليل يوفر لك خبرات إستشاريه فى التوجيه المحاسبي لكافه بنود تكاليف المطاعم و الانشطه التشغيليه فى المطاعم

الدليل المهنى فى محاسبه تكاليف المطاعم، به مهارات متكامله فى تصميم نظم الرقابه الداخليه على انشطه و تكاليف المطعم

مع هذا الدليل المهنى تستطيع توزيع و تحميل التكاليف غير المباشره على حسابات الوجبات الغذائيه و المشروبات

بين يديك منهج تطبيقي متكامل لبناء مراكز التكاليف فى المطعم و إعداد الحسابات الختاميه و حسابات نتائج الاعمال فى المطاعم

إنضم الأن لمنظومه إدارك المجانيه المقدمه من أكاديميه ماسترز للنظم الأداريه و المحاسبيه ، ومؤكد سوف تستفيد بجانب خبراء ماسترز

حسناً ... ماذا سوف استفيد من هذه الخبرات الفريده

هل سوف تتحسن صحتى؟

هل سوف أقوم بتحميل شئ ما؟

هل سوف أصبح عبقري فى عالم الأنترنت؟

الأجابه هى .......لاااااااا

سوف يصبح لديك منصتك الخاصه للتعليم الأليكترونى المستمر،سوف يكون لديك هدف قابل للتحقق و يتحقق خلال 5 دقائق فقط ؛ وهو أن تصبح محاسب مطاعم معتمد

كما لم تراها من قبل ، هذا الأسلوب التعليمي السهل و البسيط فى إستخدامه،من محاضرات الفيديو التطبيقيه و خبرات واسعه و عميقه فى أركان النظام المالي فى المطاعم

التعليم بيدك الأن بأى وقت ، وبكل مكان من خلال هاتفك المحمول او جهازك اللوحى،أو حتى الحاسب الالي و الابتوب نظامنا الأليكترونى نطوره لك منذ 2007 و حتى الأن


خمسه خطوات لتصميم نظم التكاليف بالمطاعم تعرف عليهم.

ملخصات ماسترز فى محاسبه المطاعم , فى ثلاثه محاضرات ألخص لك فيهم كيف يمكن بناء نظام التكاليف فى المطاعم.

نصف ساعه ؛ تستطيع من خلالهم الوصول للمهام المطالب بها ’ المحاسب المالي فى نشاط المطاعم إستمع الان ولنكمل بعد إستماعك

لاتنسي أن تنضم لمنظومه الكتب و الأدله المهنيه المجانيه ضمن منظومه إدراك

يمكنك تحميل كافه أنواع الملفات أو الوسائط فى منصتك التعليميه الخاصه بك مدى الحياه إسلوب الحقن الأليكترونى هو الأسهل و الأسرع للإجابه عن إستفساراتك فقط إفعل هذا بدون مصروفات إضافيه.

المنصه الأليكترونيه من أكاديميه ماسترز ، تسمح بإهداء لينك الكورس التدريبي ملخصات ماسترز فى محاسبه تكاليف المطاعم ، لمن تحب

تعلم أنت و من تحب مجاناً

إنضم الأن و تمتع بكوبون خصم 25% على كافه المهارات الأداريه الازمه لنمو أعمالك و خبراتك الأداريه


الأختبارات

إختبارات ماسترز فى محاسبه تكاليف المطاعم ، ضمن منظومه إدارك للتطوير المالي المقدمه مجاناً من أكاديميه ماسترز للنظم الأداريه و المحاسبيه

نعم ، تستطيع الأعتماد على تطبيقات ماسترز المحاسبيه ، لقياس مهاراتك و خبراتك الماليه

منظومه التعليم الأليكترونى من ماسترز أكاديمي هى

مخططك الخاص

تذيد و تطوره خبراتك المهنيه

بالتعلم المستمر ترضى ذاتك

وتتفوق بها عن زملائك

والأهم تذيد من قيمتك السوقيه ...

التطوير المهنى المستمر مع منظومه ماسترز أكاديمي .... أصبح للجميع

تجد 5000 تطبيق مجاباً عنه فى شتى فروع العلم المحاسبي و الأدارى ، منظومه إدراك المجانيه إمكانيه توفير شهاده إليكترونيه معتمده بعد إستكمال الأختبارات

لاتنسي أن تنضم لمنظومه الكتب المحاسبيه و الأدله المهنيه المجانيه ضمن منظومه إدراك

يمكنك ان، تحسن من مهارتك فى تصميم النظام المالي فى المطاعم بملخصات ماسترز فى محاسبه تكاليف المطاعم ، ضمن منظومه إدارك للتطوير المالي المقدمه مجاناً من أكاديميه ماسترز للنظم الأداريه و المحاسبيه

منظومه إختبارات إليكترونيه,تحتوى على أكثر من 5000 حاله عمليه فى مختلف فروع العلم المحاسبي و الأدارى ،مجاباً عنها , يمكنك أن تنفق عليها 15 عاماً من الممارسه العمليه اليوميه،أو مثلاً 1000 جنيه أخرى يمكنك أن تقبل بها،وهى من ضمن هذا العرض الأليكترونى الكبير لك
targetAudiences: المحاسبين الماليين
رؤساء الحسابات و المدراء الماليين
